content:
Does anybody know what went down on Tuesday at the White House with the Interoperability summit? Cerner, Sequoia, Intermountain, and Regenstreig/Indiana Health Exchange all have projects supporting the FHIR standard. SMART on FHIR in particular; but FHIR in general. And what about fingerprints???? Is there any concept of modeling fingerprint biometrics with FHIR???? Would that be a BodySite Resource???

https://www.fiercehealthcare.com/ehr/intermountain-cerner-white-house-ehr-interoperability-cms-seema-verma-jared-kushner?lipi=urn%3Ali%3Apage%3Ad_flagship3_profile_view_base_recent_activity_details_shares%3BjOj9ETGkQeG%2Fc3vTVxZqvQ%3D%3D
a few people here were at the meeting, but I think they're not allowed to say much in public until official proceedings are released
Sweet! Glad there was representation from the FHIR community. :)
